alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 1:57PM CST until December 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. Primary concern is reduced visibilities for a couple hours. * WHERE...Portions of east central, south central and southeast South Dakota and southwest Minnesota. This includes the tribal lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
